nodes.text: Wurson Harro was a Human male affiliated with the Galactic Empire. He spent time in the Emperor's Retreat in 2 ABY.

Harro first appeared in Star Wars Galaxies on September 14, 2007. In the update posted that day, a series of quests known as the "Imperial Theme Park" was changed. Harro is a "reset NPC", whose sole purpose is to reset the Theme Park quests for any players who completed the original versions of them.
